siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

Spreading the elements from one array and copying them into is one of those handy shorthands for moving data around in JavaScript. I started looking into it after seeing   <ComponentName {...props} />  in lots of React projects, and couldn't figure out what on earth was going on…
